channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: The boxer is said to consider his former fiancé as his ‘drea
item.description: The boxer is said to consider his former fiancé as his ‘dream woman’ and ‘deeply regrets the end of their relationship’

item.title: "This Government has an authoritarian streak. It’s time to s
item.description: "This Government has an authoritarian streak. It’s time to stub it out," writes Melanie McDonagh Read more: https://www.standard.co.uk/.../smoking-ban-pubs...

item.title: Bryonie Gawith, 29, Denisty Birtle, nine, Oscar Birtle, five
item.description: Bryonie Gawith, 29, Denisty Birtle, nine, Oscar Birtle, five, and 22-month-old Aubree Birtle died following the blaze at their home in Bradford
